summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 35, 2nd Plat of West Seattle, being the alley between 45th Avenue Southwest and 46th Avenue Southwest, from West Atlantic Street to West Seattle Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10424 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
